annotations.description: The Sloe Gin fizz was first published in an 1898 edition of Sunset Magazine as a warm weather refresher. Sunset Magazine which began in 1898 was established ...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Sloe Gin Fizz

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Sloe Gin
1oz (30ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup

Shake and pour over ice

Top Soda (approx 3oz 90ml) 
Lemon Wheel Garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YMf3sTl7Q4c
title: Sloe Gin Fizz
